name: Lighter
description: A simple lighter, useful for starting fires or providing a brief source of light.

name: Magnifying Glass
description: A handheld magnifying glass, helpful for examining small details and clues.

name: Flashlight
description: A battery-operated flashlight, providing a focused beam of light in dark areas.

name: Notebook
description: A small notebook for jotting down observations, clues, and ideas during an investigation.

name: Pen
description: A standard ballpoint pen, used for writing notes or marking maps.

name: Pocket Knife
description: A small folding knife, handy for basic cutting tasks and self-defense.

name: Rope
description: A length of strong rope, useful for climbing or binding objects.

name: First Aid Kit
description: A small kit containing bandages, antiseptics, and other basic medical supplies.

name: Canteen
description: A metal water container, useful for staying hydrated during long investigations.

name: Lockpicks
description: A set of lockpicking tools for opening locked doors or containers.

name: Whistle
description: A loud whistle, useful for signaling others or drawing attention.

name: Gloves
description: A pair of leather gloves, useful for handling delicate or dangerous objects.

name: Binoculars
description: A small pair of binoculars, allowing the user to see distant objects clearly.

name: Matches
description: A small box of matches for starting fires.

name: Candle
description: A wax candle that can be lit to provide light in dark areas.

name: Elder Sign Amulet
description: A mystical amulet said to ward off ancient entities and protect the wearer from certain spells.

name: Necronomicon
description: A tome filled with forbidden knowledge, granting insight into eldritch horrors but at a cost to sanity.

name: Cultist Dagger
description: A ceremonial dagger used by cultists, inflicting minor damage and perhaps darker purposes.

name: Silver Key
description: A key forged from pure silver, its purpose tied to ancient secrets.

name: Runed Stone
description: A stone carved with eldritch runes, radiating faint energy, used in ritualistic magic.
